basic_info.name: Sri Krishnadevaraya University Admissions
description: The University follows a different admission procedure for different courses. For some courses, admissions are made solely based on the merit of the student, whereas for other courses, students need to clear entrance exams, fitness test followed by an interview.

Section.name: About Sri Krishnadevaraya University
Section.description:
Sri Krishnadevaraya University, Ananthapur laid its foundation as a Postgraduate Centre of Sri Venkateswara University in the year 1967. However, with due course of time, i.e. in 1981 the Postgraduate Centre attained the status of a University. Starting with just 5 departments during its inception, the University has now come up with a total of 5 on-campus colleges:
Year of establishment
1967
Institute type
Private
Approved by
UGC

Furthermore, Sri Krishnadevaraya University offers M.Phil and Ph.D., respectively, in 14 disciplines.
